name: Happy Flappy Unicorn
description:
The fight for the rainbow has begun, and there can be only one! Soar through the sky as a unicorn and collect powerups to aid your fight against the leprechauns.

Can you collect more pots of gold than your friends? Compete against other unicorns on the international highscore list!

Features:

- Endless gamemode

- Earn points for collecting a pot of gold

- Eat donuts to barf at the leprechauns

- Destroy a leprechaun by barfing at him

- Collect clocks to slow down time

- Compete on our international highscore list
